Summary: I looked into the sky and saw this object, absolutely quiet, no engine or jet sounds, 1 light on top and bottom and with several near center
divs: sighting detailsas i was standing on my patio smoking a cigarette, as i do every evening. i was looking into the night sky as usual and enjoying the serenity of the night. i saw an object suddenly appear. it was like an elongated egg shape without a defined middle section. it was totally black in color. on top was one steady bright light. on the bottom was one light that seemed to flash every few seconds. in the center (where i would calculate the center to be) were several 2-3 lights that remained on and looked as though they may have changed colors from white, to blue to red. the object remained in one place, as in hovering. there was no sound at all, no sound of jets or engines. it just appeared without an entrance trail or other announcement and disappeared in about 1-1\2 minutes the same way. it was just visable, and then invisable in a very short time. the object was absolutely huge. many times larger than any aircraft i have seen. i can certainly understand now how these crafts can appear and disappear without many people seeing them. they are very quiet and unless you are looking exactly where they appear, you will definitely miss it. there was no time for me to contact anyone to tell them to take a look at it. it seemed that the craft came in just to view the area for a little bit. my first thought was, "wow, that's what an ufo looks like!" i was mesmerized by it. then my thoughts went to the fact that i had not heard much about ufo's lately and with all the people who have cell phones with cameras, i wondered why more pictures weren't available. i don't have access to such a phone, but even if i did, it was too dark to take a photo that would be worth anything. so, i won't say anything to anyone about this as they may think i am crazy. but, i do know what i saw and do believe it was an ufo. i was not afraid of the ufo as much as i was about what other people will think about my having seen it.
